graph_title: Children who completed high school by type of school
indicator_name: Children who completed high school by type of school
title: Untitled
national_indicator_description: Secondary school is an institution for performing an activity in the field of secondary education and upbringing. A school performs educational activity by realizing the educational plan and programme. That is an institution where general and vocational knowledge and skills, required for continuing education, are being acquired. School can be established as grammar schools, secondary technical or vocational schools, religious schools, art schools and school for children with disabilities.
